sections.heading: S4. Ep 3. Talking with Damien Quinn about Construction, Tech Start-ups & AI: From Cadet to CEO!

sections.content: Hey, Legends! Welcome to another episode of ~[The Building Talks Podcast!](https://feeds.buzzsprout.com/1850552.rss)~ This week, Iâ€™m catching up with ~[Damien Quinn,](https://www.linkedin.com/in/quinndamien/)~ a bloke whoâ€™s made the bold move from construction project management to tech entrepreneur. Starting out as a cadet while studying, he climbed the ranks at Multiplex, then took the leap into software, start-ups, and securing capital to growâ€”and heâ€™s got some cracking insights to share!

We chat about the shift from building sites to software development, the role of AI in construction, and the challenges of capital raising. Plus, Damien gives us the inside scoop on how real-time quality assurance tech like ~[Visibuild](https://visibuild.com/)~ is shaking up the industry.

sections.content: If youâ€™re in construction, tech, or thinking about making a career move, this episode is full of real talk, great insights, and practical takeaways. Whether youâ€™re leading a team, starting a business, or just keen to understand how software is transforming construction, you wonâ€™t want to miss it!
